meanings.definition: To take up and practice or use.
meanings.sent1: She adopts a healthy lifestyle by eating fruits and vegetables every day.
meanings.sent2: He adopts a new hobby of painting to relax after work.
meanings.sent3: The cat adopts a playful attitude when chasing a ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: The student adopts a diligent approach to studying for the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: The chef adopts a unique cooking style that combines different cultural flavors.

meanings.definition: To take into one's family through legal means and raise as one's own.
meanings.sent1: The couple adopts a baby girl and showers her with love and care.
meanings.sent2: They decide to adopt a child from a different country to expand their family.
meanings.sent3: The dog adopts a protective stance over the new puppy in the house.
meanings.sent4: The king adopts an orphaned prince to ensure the kingdom's future.
meanings.sent5: The family adopts a rescue dog and gives it a forever home.

meanings.definition: To choose or take as one's own.
meanings.sent1: She adopts a positive attitude towards challenges and never gives up.
meanings.sent2: He adopts a new philosophy on life after a meaningful conversation.
meanings.sent3: The tree adopts a majestic appearance in the middle of the forest.
meanings.sent4: The company adopts a customer-first approach to improve satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The artist adopts a minimalist style in their latest collection.
